nodes.text: The Paataatus were a sentient species with a swarm mentality. The Chiss Ascendancy led an attack on numerous Paataatus fighters above the Paataatus homeworld, Nettehi.
The Paataatus were introduced in the 2020 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Chaos Rising, written by Timothy Zahn. On several occasions, the species' name is spelled "Paataasus."
